entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Friday 20 January 2023
